title: Propaganda Classification
description: In this project I evaluated  Random Forest classifiers and RoBERTa models used to detect propaganda and different propaganda techniques.

title: Exploring ADHD communities using Reddit
description: This project was developed for my Data Science MSc dissertation, I evaluated the topics discussed and sentiments of ADHD online communities and how this differs from non-ADHD communities.

title: IMDB analysis
description: I analyzed the dataset to gain insights into movie trends and popularity over time

title: Web application to track wellbeing
description: This project was part of my undergraduate dissertation where I designed and developed and app to keep logs of different health and daily variables and find basic relationships between them
